title: being independent, relationship advice & dealing with gossip: advice from the gals
itunes:title: being independent, relationship advice & dealing with gossip: advice from the gals
description:
Brooke and Danielle read listener submissions and share their best advice.  The gals discuss the best relationship advice they have ever heard, tips on dealing with rejection from jobs/schools, how to deal with gossip and more!

Check out the Business of the week, xochrisco!  https://www.etsy.com/shop/xochrisco

Danielle’s Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/c/daniellecarolan  

Danielle’s Instagram https://www.instagram.com/daniellecarolan/
